entry.title: 4-Comp Smooth Crank Grinder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Grinder
Price: 9.99

Crank out some freshly busted bud with the 62mm Smooth Crank Grinder in Black. This matte black 4-comp grinder features a unique hand crank that is easy on the wrists. Grinding up even the stickiest nugs an easy operation thanks to its sharp, strong, diamond-shaped teeth. This novel 62mm contraption contains a built-in kief catcher and mesh screen, so you can put a little away for a rainy day with each grind.

  • Hand Crank
  • Clear Window
  • Diamond-Shaped Teeth
  • Pollen Screen
  • Kief Catcher
  • Four-piece design
  • Matte Black
  • 62mm Diameter

entry.title: Famous X 59mm Acrylic Grinder – Tray of 12 – Black/Red/White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Grinder
Price: 19.99

Affordable quality X smart design. This is Famous X, a collection which brings you functional everyday cannabis products at affordable prices.

The Famous X 59mm Acrylic Grinder is a lightweight, easy-to-use grinder with a classic 2-piece design. It’s sharp, pointed teeth will make short work of even the most dese buds. It’s low cost and consistent functionality make it a perfect addition to any stoner’s kit, for beginners and veterans like.

 

  • Lightweight acrylic body
  • Sharp, pointed teeth
  • Classic 2-piece design
  • Available in 3 varieties
  • POP display tray included
  • 60mm diameter
  • Assorted tray of 12

entry.title: 3 Comp Grinder with Top Pattern
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant
Type: Grinder
Price: 4.99

Bust up your buds in style with this attractive metal grinder. Solid metal constructions means that it’s built to last, and its diamond-shaped teeth will break up the super-dense and the sticky-icky with ease. It includes a built-in kief catcher and features an eye-catching pattern on the top. This item is an essential buy for smokers everywhere.

  • Quality metal construction
  • Diamon-shaped teeth
  • Three-piece design with kief catcher
  • Eye-catching pattern on top
  • [add technical specs: diameter]

entry.title: Puff Puff Pass Strain Pineapple Express 3 Stage Grinder Green and Yellow 55mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: PUFF PUFF PASS
Type: Grinder
Price: 9.90

Puff, Puff, Pass has come out with the perfect way to show love to your favorite strains. By putting them on their new collection of pipes and grinders! These awesome pieces come in a multitude of colors and are emblazoned with their signature strain. Collect your favorite, or all of them.

Rise and grind with this 55mm 3-stage aluminum strain grinder. It’s the ideal size for grinding at home or on the go. The top piece is held in place magnetically, ensuring you get the perfect grind, every time. The comfort fit grooves don’t hurt either! Equipped with chisel-tip teeth to expertly tear and fluff your herbs as they get small enough to fall through the holes onto the fine, mesh screen. The screen chamber is a great place for storing your herb. The exterior is threaded, so everything inside remains safe and secure. The mesh screen filters your most potent bits down to the bottom section. This is the large, kief reservoir. Also kept in place with threading, it protects your super stash that you’ve saved for a rainy day (or just, a regular day). Collect your crystals easily with the little scraper that comes included with every grinder.

Pineapple Express is a green and yellow grinder. The top is green with the strain name in yellow emblazoned on the lid. Below the text it also features a yellow pineapple with a light leaf on the top. The bottom piece features a green Puff, Puff, Pass logo. Pineapple Express fills you with productive and creative energy.

entry.title: San Rafael-Grinder Medium-Blue-50mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Grinder
Price: 9.99

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

This aluminum 3-stage grinder’s top is sealed with a magnetic closure to help keep everything secure. Use the chisel-tip teeth to tear and fluff your herbs to perfection. The bottom two layers are threaded together to ensure the safety of your ground material. Once optimally ground in the top section the material moves down through the holes to the mid-section. This compartment is ideal for storing your ground herbs. The most potent pieces will filter down through the mesh screen and land in the kief compartment, the secret space where the best bits are kept. 

This 50mm/ 2” grinder has comfort grooves on the sides for a more ergonomic grind. The stunning blue colour is complimented by the classic white San Rafael logo on the top of the grinder. Fun and functional, this grinder is sure to impress.

entry.title: Rock Legends Jimi Love Black 55mm 3 Stage Grinder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rock Legends
Type: Grinder
Price: 12.45

After receiving his first guitar at 15, he taught himself to play by watching and learning from experienced entertainers. He was fired from his first gig for showing off, but later became one of the most influential guitarists and celebrated musicians in history. He headlined massive music festivals like Woodstock and Isle of Wright. In 1970 he tragically succumbed to the infamous 27 Club. Leaving behind an eternal legacy and securing his place as a rock legend.

Love is a 3-stage grinder made from aluminum. It features comfort grooves on the top and bottom to make grinding easier than ever. The top piece is held in place magnetically to ensure ideal movement and no spilling during transport. Love has chisel-tip teeth to tear and fluff your herb to perfection. Once ground sufficiently your herb falls down to the middle storage chamber. Your stash is safely tucked away behind the threaded sections. Below your storage is a fine, mesh screen. This screen filters your most potent bits to the bottom reservoir. These are best saved for a rainy day, or to make your session even sweeter. The bottom chamber is threaded as well and is equipped with a small scraping tool to effortlessly collect your kief.

This 55mm black grinder (5.5x5cm/2.2x2”) is adorned with an iconic black and white image of the rock legend. Behind him is an intricate pattern filled with peace and love and the word Love.

entry.title: Rock Legends Fab4 Abbey Road 3 Stage Grinder Black 55mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rock Legends
Type: Grinder
Price: 12.45

The Abbey Road formed at the end of the 1950’s in Liverpool. Credited with starting the British Invasion in the USA they are hailed as the most influential band of all time. In 1988 they were inducted into the Rock & Roll hall of fame and are regarded as the best-selling band of all time. Although only 2 members remain, the impact they had will be forever remembered as they’ve secured their places as rock legends.

Abbey Road is a 3-stage grinder made from aluminum. It features comfort grooves on the top and bottom to make grinding easier than ever. The top piece is held in place magnetically to ensure ideal movement and no spilling during transport. Abbey Road has chisel-tip teeth to tear and fluff your herb to perfection. Once ground sufficiently your herb falls down to the middle storage chamber. Your stash is safely tucked away behind the threaded sections. Below your storage is a fine, mesh screen. This screen filters your most potent bits to the bottom reservoir. These are best saved for a rainy day, or to make your session even sweeter. The bottom chamber is threaded as well and is equipped with a small scraping tool to effortlessly collect your kief.

This 55mm black grinder (5.5x5cm/2.2x2”) is adorned with the iconic image of the rock legends crossing Abbey Road from their famous album cover.

entry.title: Grinder Metal Aurora Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Grinder
Price: 7.49 - 12.49 (3 variants)

This aluminum 3-stage grinder has a magnetic closure and uses diamond-cut teeth to perfectly tear and fluff your herbs. It then falls through the holes onto the fine, mesh screen. The threaded mid-section securely holds what you want to save for later. Your finest, most potent material filters down through the screen and is captured in the large kief reservoir at the bottom.

Available in small 40mm, medium 50mm, and large 62mm.

entry.title: PUFF PUFF PASS Grinder 3 stage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Puff Puff Pass
Type: Grinder
Price: 9.90

Puff, Puff, Pass this aluminum herb grinder over. With three stages and a stunning rainbow finish you won’t want to let this grinder out of your sight. The lid has the fun Puff, Puff, Pass logo adorned on it and is outfitted with comfort fit grooves to make grinding more pleasant. The top pieces are held together magnetically, allowing for an easy grind and preventing the lid from coming off while traveling. All of the other sections are threaded together, making the seal very tight. Strong, diamond-cut teeth tear and fluff your herb to perfection in the top portion. Holes allow for the herb to travel into the storage reservoir, which features a window so you can see how much you’ve got in there. After that, the fine mesh screen filters all your most potent bits down into the bottom kief compartment, and the included scraper lets you collect everything to use at your leisure.

entry.title: SKULLS & PISTOLS GUNS N’ ROSES 3-STAGE GRINDER – 50MM
entry.summary:
Vendor: Guns N Roses
Type: Grinder
Price: 12.45

The wait is over! One of the greatest hard rock bands of our time, Guns N’ Roses, has finally released their own officially licensed line of smoking accessories. In this cool, new collection are six designs, including a water pipe, a dab rig, 2 grinders and 2 styles of hand pipes all featuring iconic artwork familiar to superfans and anyone who loves rock music. Sit back and use Skulls and Pistols, a 50mm 3-stage grinder, with iconic GNR imagery.

This three-stage magnetic aluminum grinder is part of the GNR collection and is a must have tool for your smoking kit. This metal four piece herb grinder stays together securely by threading together the bottom three pieces, while the top piece is held in place by magnets.

The sharp diamond-cut teeth will tear and fluff your herbs to perfection. Breaking your herb into chunks will help this process and ensure longevity to the grinder. Once ground your herb will fall through the holes into the middle chamber. Use this as storage or as a little dish for packing bowls or joints. Underneath this section you’ll find a fine, mesh screen. This filters all your most potent bits to the bottom level. The lowest compartment is where you’ll find your kief, use the included scraper to collect these bits and use them for a rainy day or just to add a little sass to your everyday smoke.

This all black grinder comes adorned with a cool top graphic. A top hat wearing skull is in front of crossed pistols and surrounded by a plethora of roses with fun, GNR font across the hat.

So whether you’re a die-hard fan, collector, or simply looking for a solid grinder that will last, this Guns N’ Roses 4-part magnetic aluminum grinder is the perfect choice. Shop this and the rest of the GNR collection right here, while supplies last.

entry.title: Grinder Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Grinder
Price: 4.50

Grind on the go! This sneaky metal grinder fits easily in your wallet, pocket or stash kit. Use it like a cheese grater by rubbing your herb along the shredder, just make sure the surface you’re grinding onto is clean. This underrated and efficient little grinder is incredibly easy to clean. Using 99% alcohol and a little brush will get it back to travel-ready.

entry.title: Grinder King Skull-2 Comp
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Grinder
Price: 4.90

This grinder is tough as nails. Equipped with strong, sharp teeth to shred your herbs and a mesh screen underneath, this grinder gets the job done. A storage compartment in the bottom handles the kief collection and in a pinch can be used for storage.
